front.title: Session Description Protocol (SDP) - Revised Offer/Answer Protocol (SDPCapNeg & MediaCapNeg) - Offer/Answer Examples

abstract.t: This document gives examples of Session Description Protocol (SDP) offer/answer exchanges. The SDP offer/answer protocol was revised by [SDPCapNeg] and [MediaCapNeg] plus other extensions. Examples include the indication, negotiation and selection of media configurations ("codecs"). This document discusses examples of IP bearer emulation scenarios for PSTN modem calls in SIP-controlled VoIP networks. The purpose of this document is thus the same as the list of examples by RFC 4317 [2] for the legacy SDP offer/answer protocol (RFC 3264 [1]).
